txt.en: This hidden glade must be a very sacred place to the Woses. Rhûd-pulo-Drât seems nervous
A strange howling sound emanates from the Púkel-men statues
The last of the Dheghûn falls and calm is restored to the glade
'The Okwô-kuryô here are awake again. Their hearts beat like sap through a Dhûrghud.  Balance has come to Luk Khakát. Let us return to Drû Bhûta.'
Ghân-buri-Ghân believes Rhûd-pulo-Drât may need the newly constructed ward more than the entire village of Drû Bhûta to protect the Drúadan Wood.
Defeat the Dheghûn in the glade.
Instance: Glade of the Three Merry-makers
'Drû Bhûta must hear this new tale.'
